bibl.title: J.W. Tripp v. Territory of Washington. Order of the Court
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

org.orgName: Jefferson County Third Judicial District Court

p.del: In the County Court of the _____ County of _____ STATE OF _____

body.p: State of Territory of Washington } ss. _____ County of Jefferson
The People of the State of ____ to John H. Woodly, Sheriff of Jefferson County W.T. GREETING: In the matter of the United States

We command you, that you have the body of J.W. Tripp by you imprisoned and detained, as it is said, together with the time and cause of such imprisonment and detention, by whatsoever name said J.W. Tripp shall be called or charged, before the Hon. C.B. Darwin County Judge of the U.S. County of District Court at the Court Room of the County Court of the County of Jefferson on the Fourth day of June A.D. 1867 at 12 o'clock in the..... noon of that day, to do and receive what shall then and there be considered concerning the said J.W. Tripp
And have you then and there this writ.
Witness, Hon. C.B. Darwin Judge of the siad County Court, at the Court Room thereof, in the _____ County of Jefferson this Fourth day of June A.D. 1867
Attest, my hand and the seak if the said Court, the day and year last above written.
James Seavey Clerk By _____ Deputy Clerk
